content: निकाम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [नि कम् घञ्] {@--1@} Plentiful copious, abundant; निकाजलां स्त्रोतोवहां <ls>Ś. 6. 16.</ls> {@--2@} Desirous of. --मः, --मं Wish, desire. --मं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} According to one's wish or desire, agreeably to desire. {@--2@} To one's satisfaction, to the heart's content; रात्रौ निकामं शयितव्यमपि नास्ति <ls>Ś. 2</ls> ‘I cannot even sleep at ease or comfortably at night.’ {@--3@} Very much, exceedingly निकामं क्षामांगी <ls>Māl. 2. 3</ls>; often used as the first member of <ab>comp.</ab> when it loses its final म्; निकामनिरंकुशः <ls>Gīt. 7</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 23</ls>; <ls>Śi. 4. 54.</ls>
